name: exciting
description: meta info used by the exciting parser, all names are expected to start with exciting

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_core_forces
metaInfos.description: core correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_core_forces_x
metaInfos.description: x-component of the core correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_core_forces_y
metaInfos.description: y-component of the core correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_core_forces_z
metaInfos.description: z-component of the core correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_forces_x
metaInfos.description: x-component of the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_forces_y
metaInfos.description: y-component of the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_forces_z
metaInfos.description: z-component of the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_hf_forces
metaInfos.description: HF correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_hf_forces_x
metaInfos.description: x-component of the HF Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_hf_forces_y
metaInfos.description: y-component of the HF Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_hf_forces_z
metaInfos.description: z-component of the HF Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_ibs_forces
metaInfos.description: IBS correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_ibs_forces_x
metaInfos.description: x-component of the IBS correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_ibs_forces_y
metaInfos.description: y-component of the IBS correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_ibs_forces_z
metaInfos.description: z-component of the IBS correction to the Force acting on the atoms.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_label
metaInfos.description: labels of atoms in geometry optimization

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_number
metaInfos.description: number to identify the atoms of a species in the geometry optimization

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_atom_position_format
metaInfos.description: whether the atomic positions are given in cartesian or vector coordinates

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_band_energies
metaInfos.description: $k$-dependent energies of the electronic band structure.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_band_k_points
metaInfos.description: Fractional coordinates of the k points (in the basis of the reciprocal-lattice vectors) for which the electronic energy are given.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_band_number_of_kpoints
metaInfos.description: number of points along the kpoint path used for the bandstructure plot

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_band_number_of_vertices
metaInfos.description: number of vertices along the kpoint path used for the bandstructure plot

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_band_structure_kind
metaInfos.description: String to specify the kind of band structure (either electronic or vibrational).

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_band_vertex_coordinates
metaInfos.description: coordinates of the vertices along the kpoint path used for the bandstructure plot

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_band_vertex_labels
metaInfos.description: labels of the vertices along the kpoint path used for the bandstructure plot

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_clathrates
metaInfos.description: It indicates whether the system is a clathrate.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_clathrates_atom_coordinates
metaInfos.description: Ordered list of the atoms coordinates in the clathrates.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_clathrates_atom_labels
metaInfos.description: Labels of the atoms in the clathrates.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_dos_energy
metaInfos.description: energy value for a dos point

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_electronic_structure_method
metaInfos.description: String identifying the used electronic structure method. Allowed values are BSE and TDDFT. Temporary metadata to be canceled when BSE and TDDFT will be added to public metadata electronic_structure_method

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_atom_forces_x
metaInfos.description: x component of the force acting on the atom

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_atom_forces_y
metaInfos.description: y component of the force acting on the atom

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_atom_forces_z
metaInfos.description: z component of the force acting on the atom

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_atom_number
metaInfos.description: number to identify the atoms of a species

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_dummy
metaInfos.description: time for scf in geometry optimization

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_optimization_threshold_force
metaInfos.description: Value of threshold for the force modulus as convergence criterion of the geometry_optimization_method used in exciting

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_reciprocal_lattice_vector_x
metaInfos.description: x component of reciprocal lattice vector

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_reciprocal_lattice_vector_y
metaInfos.description: y component of reciprocal lattice vector

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_geometry_reciprocal_lattice_vector_z
metaInfos.description: z component of reciprocal lattice vector

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_gkmax
metaInfos.description: Maximum length of |G+k| for APW functions

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_grid_fermi_surface
metaInfos.description: number of points in the mesh to calculate the Fermi surface

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_lmaxapw
metaInfos.description: Angular momentum cut-off for the APW functions

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_magnetic_field_format
metaInfos.description: whether the magnetic field is given in cartesian or vector coordinates

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_maximum_force_magnitude
metaInfos.description: Maximum force magnitude in geometry optimization

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_mt_external_magnetic_field_atom_number
metaInfos.description: number to identify the atoms of a species on which a magnetic field is applied

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_mt_external_magnetic_field_x
metaInfos.description: x component of the magnetic field

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_mt_external_magnetic_field_y
metaInfos.description: y component of the magnetic field

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_mt_external_magnetic_field_z
metaInfos.description: z component of the magnetic field

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_number_of_atoms
metaInfos.description: The number of atoms in the unit cell

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_number_of_bands_fermi_surface
metaInfos.description: Number of bands for fermi surface

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_number_of_mesh_points_fermi_surface
metaInfos.description: Number of mesh points for fermi surface

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_origin_fermi_surface
metaInfos.description: Origin (in lattice coordinate) of the region where the Fermi surface is calculated

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_scf_threshold_charge_change
metaInfos.description: Specifies the threshold for the x_exciting_effective_potential_convergence between two subsequent self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_scf_threshold_charge_change_list
metaInfos.description: Specifies the threshold for the x_exciting_effective_potential_convergence between two subsequent self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_scf_threshold_energy_change
metaInfos.description: Specifies the threshold for the x_exciting_energy_total_scf_iteration change between two subsequent self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_scf_threshold_force_change
metaInfos.description: Convergence tolerance for forces (not including IBS contribution) during the SCF run

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_scf_threshold_force_change_list
metaInfos.description: Convergence tolerance for forces (not including IBS contribution) during the SCF run.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_scf_threshold_potential_change
metaInfos.description: Specifies the threshold for the x_exciting_effective_potential_convergence between two subsequent self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_scf_threshold_potential_change_list
metaInfos.description: Specifies the threshold for the x_exciting_effective_potential_convergence between two subsequent self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_section_atoms_group
metaInfos.description: a group of atoms of the same type

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_simulation_reciprocal_cell
metaInfos.description: Reciprocal lattice vectors (in Cartesian coordinates) of the simulation cell. The first index runs over the $x,y,z$ Cartesian coordinates, and the second index runs over the 3 lattice vectors.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_store_total_forces
metaInfos.description: Temporary storing converged atom forces cartesian

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_vectors_fermi_surface
metaInfos.description: Vectors (in lattice coordinate) defining the region where the Fermi surface is calculated

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_volume_optimization
metaInfos.description: If the volume optimization is performed.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_broadening
metaInfos.description: Lorentzian broadening applied to the spectra.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_angular_momentum_cutoff
metaInfos.description: Angular momentum cutoff of the spherical harmonics expansion of the dielectric matrix.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_antiresonant
metaInfos.description: If the anti-resonant part of the Hamiltonian is used for the BSE spectrum

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_epsilon_energies
metaInfos.description: Energies of the dielectric function epsilon

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_epsilon_im
metaInfos.description: Imaginary part of the dielectric function epsilon

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_epsilon_re
metaInfos.description: Real part of the dielectric function epsilon

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_exciton_amplitude_im
metaInfos.description: Imaginary part of the transition amplitude

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_exciton_amplitude_re
metaInfos.description: Real part of the transition amplitude

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_number_of_bands
metaInfos.description: Range of bands included for the BSE calculation. The first pair of numbers corresponds to the band index for local orbitals and valence states (counted from the lowest eigenenergy), the second pair corresponds to the band index of the conduction states (counted from the Fermi level).

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_number_of_components
metaInfos.description: Number of independent components in the dielectric tensor

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_number_of_energy_points
metaInfos.description: Energy mesh for the dielectric function, conductivity and loss function

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_sciavbd
metaInfos.description: if the body of the screened Coulomb interaction is averaged (q=0).

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_sciavqbd
metaInfos.description: if the body of the screened Coulomb interaction is averaged (q!=0).

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_sciavqhd
metaInfos.description: if the head of the screened Coulomb interaction is averaged (q=0).

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_sciavqwg
metaInfos.description: if the wings of the screened Coulomb interaction is averaged (q=0).

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_sciavtype
metaInfos.description: how the screened Coulomb interaction matrix is averaged

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_sigma_energies
metaInfos.description: Energies of the conductivity function sigma

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_sigma_im
metaInfos.description: Imaginary part of the conductivity function sigma

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_sigma_re
metaInfos.description: Real part of the conductivity function sigma

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_type
metaInfos.description: which parts of the BSE Hamiltonian is considered. Possible values are IP, RPA, singlet, triplet.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_xas_number_of_bands
metaInfos.description: Range of bands included for the BSE calculation. The pair corresponds to the band index of the conduction states (counted from the Fermi level).

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_xasatom
metaInfos.description: Atom number for which the XAS is calculated.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_xasedge
metaInfos.description: Defines the initial states of the XAS calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_bse_xasspecies
metaInfos.description: Species number for which the XAS is calculated..

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_gqmax
metaInfos.description: G vector cutoff for the plane-waves matrix elements.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_lmaxapw
metaInfos.description: Angular momentum cut-off for the APW functions.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_ngridk
metaInfos.description: k-point mesh for the excited states calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_ngridq
metaInfos.description: q-point mesh for the excited states calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_number_of_empty_states
metaInfos.description: Number of empty states used in the calculation of the response function.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_screening_ngridk
metaInfos.description: k-point mesh for the calculation of the screening.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_screening_number_of_empty_states
metaInfos.description: Number of empty states used in the calculation of the screening.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_screening_type
metaInfos.description: Type of screening used in the calculations. POssible values are full, diag, noinvdiag, longrange.

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_screening_vkloff
metaInfos.description: k-point set offset for the screening

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_starting_point
metaInfos.description: Exchange-correlation functional of the ground-state calculation. See xc_functional list at https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/XC-functional

metaInfos.name: x_exciting_xs_xstype
metaInfos.description: Type of excited states calculation, BSE or TDDFT
